title: Carcassonne: a French fortress = Carcassonne, fortifications francaises
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Cities and towns
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/France - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/France - Social life and customs
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Languages, Modern - Study and teaching
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Language and languages - Study and teaching
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Foreign language films
description: A French language teaching film. Presents a visual tour through Carcassonne, the finest example of a fortified medieval city. Shows how the past influences the lives of the townspeople and includes scenes of shops, schools and farms as well as a brief sequence of a French family. Suitable for secondary school level.
